mapper.insert: insert into auction(auction_no, auction_name, auction_group, start_date, end_date, auction_up, auction_down, auction_unit, auction_area, auction_content, auction_title_img ) values(auction_no.nextval, #{auction_name}, #{auction_group}, to_date(#{start_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), to_date(#{end_date}, 'yyyy-mm-dd hh24:mi:ss'), #{auction_up}, #{auction_down}, #{auction_unit}, #{auction_area}, #{auction_content}, null )
mapper.select: select auction_no, auction_name, auction_up, auction_down, auction_title_img from auction where auction_no > 0
